contentList.content: The remaining amount of times that you may utilize your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> this turn.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> will not activate when attacking this creature until they have started their next turn.

Deal an extra [1] damage to a creature you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against. You must be wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> in order to trigger Sneak Attack.

Deal an extra [1] damage to a creature you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against. You must be wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> in order to trigger Sneak Attack.
You can also Sneak Attack creatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLANKED">Threatened</LSTag> by adjacent allies provided you aren't attacking with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Spend one of your Lucky dice to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>. This effect can be toggled at any time.

Spend one of your Lucky dice to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> or force enemies to attack you with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. Once per turn, the first time you deal or take damage will consume one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag>.

Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. This effect can be toggled at any time.
While in combat, you have a 50% chance to restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> at the beginning of your turns.
You may utilize your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> two times per turn.

When an enemy makes a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to take only half the damage.
When an enemy makes a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, take only half of the damage.
You may utilize your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> three times per turn.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> can trigger when casting <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> and Spells. Additionally, casting Cantrips and Spells while <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hidden</LSTag> will not break <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Stealth</LSTag>.

Deal an extra [1] to a creature you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against. If casting a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> or Spell, Sneak Attack will instead deal Force damage. You must be wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> in order to trigger Sneak Attack.

Grant yourself or another creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisibility</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. Upon being damaged, this effect is disabled for three turns.
Affected creature is forcing all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against them to be rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Affected creature cannot benefit from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TrickoftheLight">Trick of the Light</LSTag>.
Once per turn, casting a Spell while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> will not consume a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Once per turn, you may teleport as a free action through the use of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ArcaneAmbush">Arcane Ambush</LSTag>.
Surrounded by arcane energy, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
At the start of each of your turns, if visible, you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> until the end of your turn.

You immediately restore your Action and Bonus Action at the beginning of combat and have Advantage when attacking targets who have not taken a turn yet.

Outside of combat, while Sneaking or Invisible, any successful Attack Roll you make deals an additonal 6 damage multiplied by your level. The type of damage dealt is the same as your main-hand melee weapon.

Every three turns while in combat, you gain an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="AssassinsMark">Assassin's Mark</LSTag>. You may use these to trigger <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Assassinate">Assassinate</LSTag> while in combat. Killing an enemy with this passive active will not expend your Assassin's Mark. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Affected creature will gain an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="AssassinsMark">Assassin's Mark</LSTag> upon accruing three stacks of this condition.
Affected creature may trigger <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Assassinate">Assassinate</LSTag> when dealing damage.

Each turn while in combat, you have a 33% chance to gain an Assassin's Mark.

Expend an Assassin's Mark to trigger Assassinate on your next instance of damage. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Used to trigger <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Assassinate">Assassinate</LSTag> when dealing damage.

All successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag> targets are considered <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, you have a chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprise</LSTag> your target upon dealing damage.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, dealing damage to a target leaves it unable to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ALERTED">Alerted</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
Affected creature is unable to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ALERTED">Alerted</LSTag>.
Dealing damage to a target with less than 10% of its total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> instantly kills them.
Equally as intelligent as you are cunning, you can talk your way through any situation. And when blades are drawn, you can speak that language, too.

Gain a bonus to your Initiative equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

In addition, Sneak Attack may now trigger at any time provided you don't have Disadvantage when making the Attack Roll and the target is not Alerted.
Deal an extra [1] damage to a creature. You must be wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> in order to trigger Sneak Attack.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DirtyTrick_Disarm">Disarming Feint</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DirtyTrick_Blind">Blinding Powder</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DirtyTrick_Vicious">Mocking Tone</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DirtyTrick_Panache">Panache</LSTag>.

Toss a handful of powder at a target, dealing damage equal to your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> them.
Attack a target and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarm</LSTag> them.
Dismantle a creatures confidence, causing their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> to be made with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

Roll a Persuasion based <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Check</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PANACHE">Provoke</LSTag> all nearby creatures. Each creature will roll an Insight based Skill Check to resist your provocation.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when not attacking the creature who provoked them.
Gain status immunity to falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. In addition, you now always succed Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Throw a grenade at a target.

Each of your Mercenary abilities are are improved, allowing you to target an additional creature. <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DirtyTrick_Panache">Panache</LSTag> now affects all humanoids in a [1] radius.
Summon the explosive power of cannons fired indiscriminately, blanketing an area of the battlefield at random.
Your mastery of evasion makes the antics of a scoundrel second nature.

You always start combat with all of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Points</LSTag>. When an enemy is about to hit you, you can use a Luck Point in order to cause it to miss. When you are about to miss an enemy, you can use a Luck Point in order to cause your attack to hit.
When an enemy is about to hit you, use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> in order to cause it to miss.
When you are about to miss an enemy, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> in order to cause it to hit.

Once per turn, you can use any of your Common Actions without expending an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. This effect can be toggled at any time.

Common Actions include <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengaging</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helping</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hiding</LSTag>, making <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Dip">Dipping</LSTag> weapons, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jumping</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Shove">Shoving</LSTag>.

Gain status immunity to all physical effects which would impede your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> or sight. Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, you create a small <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FogCloud">Fog Cloud</LSTag> around yourself. This can be toggled at any time.

When you roll a Critical Miss against an enemy, or when an enemy rolls a Critical Miss against you, all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> you make during your next turn will be a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> will all be <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> until the end of their next turn.
<LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="LuckyToss">Lucky Toss</LSTag> now restores a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> every turn.

Covert planning plays the tune to a dance of masterful subterfuge.
Every step disguising a calculated gambit.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_CunningFangs">Cunning Fang</LSTag>, allowing you to throw a dagger as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag>. The damage of Cunning Fang increases as you level, and may trigger <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag>. While <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Nimble_Movement">Nimble Movement</LSTag> is toggled on, you instead throw the dagger as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Throw a dagger at a target.

When you roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, roll an additional damage die.

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you immediately <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>.
Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag> one time without expending any resources.
Affected creature may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag> one time without expending any resources.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, the number needed in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by one.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attacks</LSTag> halve your targets <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and prevent them from using <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Affected creature has had their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> halved and cannot <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">React</LSTag>.

Summon an illusory decoy which erupts into fireworks upon vanishing, Blinding any nearby creatures.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced and will not break Stealth.
You permanently benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT_ROGUE">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>.
While obscured in shadow, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increases by two.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. In addition, each turn you have a 50% chance to recover one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag>.

When an enemy fails a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against you, you may spend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to make one against them in retaliation, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> them for the rest of their turn in the process.

When an enemy fails a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against you, make one against them in retaliation, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> them for the rest of their turn in the process.

Gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. When making an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>, you inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HAG_STILLBORN">Hemorrhaged</LSTag> for three turns.

Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. This effect can be toggled at any time.

When making a <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, you add a bonus of 20 to the result.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, teleport up to [1]. Your ability to warp is not limited by line of sight.
Teleport up to [1]. Your ability to warp is not limited by line of sight.

Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Sneaking</LSTag> or becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>, or upon starting your turn while Sneaking or Invisible, all enemies within [1] of you are afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTERS_MARK">Hunter's Mark</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag> and the ability to see within magical darkness.

When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, you may spend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> until the end of your next turn.
When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> until the end of your next turn.
Affected creature is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> until the end of their next turn.
When dealing damage with a weapon, you potentially afflict your target with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TOXIN_WYVERN">Wyvern Toxin</LSTag> for three turns.
